changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "agent" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "status" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "version" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "last_seen_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "public_key" TEXT NULL, "metadata" JSONB NULL, "cluster_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("cluster_id") REFERENCES "cluster" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE ); CREATE INDEX "idx_agent_cluster_status_active" ON "agent" ("cluster_id", "status") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_agent_cluster_last_seen_active" ON "agent" ("cluster_id", "last_seen_at") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "last_seen_at" IS NOT NULL;
